name: Virus Defender (Jeremys556)
description:
Part of a submission for the 2022 Temple.edu PSA Contest. The game is in very early stages and is planned on being developed further if support is shown.

This game is a kids-friendly zombie-style game where you defend against viruses and complete various cybersecurity-related tasks.

https://sites.temple.edu/psacontest/

Lead Code Designer: Jeremy Sheridan

Lead Modeler: Ryan Schreurs

Co-Lead Modeler: Joshua Rodriguez

Map Designer: Jared DeJesus

If you need a version for macOS or Linux please contact me and I can upload it for those versions.
